QuestData.Title: We Be Needin' Supplies
QuestData.Description: Commander, our forces are not prepared for frost fightin'. I took da liberty and sent some of our shadow hunters north to establish a supply base. $b$bYa might want to be headin' up dere and see what they be up to. Look for a hollow between the Crackling Plains and the Savage Crag.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Shadow Hunter Rala at Darkspear's Edge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Shadow Hunter Rala at Darkspear's Edge.
QuestData.RewardText: Eh dere, boss-mon! Watch ya step. Da ground be cracklin' and breakin' everywhere.
